Operation 'get-/crm/v3/extensions/cards-dev/{appId}_getAll' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_context, missing_output_details. Original summary is too generic. Description lacks detail about what card information is returned and the operational context. Enhanced version specifies that it returns card definitions with their configurations, helping AI agents understand the scope and content of the response.

data.current_description: Returns a list of cards for a given app.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve all card definitions for an app
data.description_suggestion: Returns a list of all card definitions configured for the specified app. Each card definition includes its configuration, display settings, data fetch configuration, and custom actions. This operation is useful for retrieving the complete card inventory for an app.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too generic. Description lacks detail about what card information is returned and the operational context. Enhanced version specifies that it returns card definitions with their configurations, helping AI agents understand the scope and content of the response.

message: Operation 'post-/crm/v3/extensions/cards-dev/{appId}_create' has semantic quality issues: missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Summary is adequate, but description lacks critical details about inputs (CardCreateRequest), outputs (card ID, full definition), and the activation behavior. Enhanced version clarifies what data is expected, what is returned, and when the card becomes active for better AI agent understanding.

data.current_description: Defines a new card that will become active on an account when this app is installed.
data.description_suggestion: Creates a new card definition for the specified app. Accepts a CardCreateRequest containing the card's display configuration, data fetch settings, and custom actions. Returns the created card definition with a unique card ID. The card becomes active on accounts when the app is installed. Requires the app ID in the path.
data.reasoning: Summary is adequate, but description lacks critical details about inputs (CardCreateRequest), outputs (card ID, full definition), and the activation behavior. Enhanced version clarifies what data is expected, what is returned, and when the card becomes active for better AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'get-/crm/v3/extensions/cards-dev/{appId}/{cardId}_getById' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details. Summary uses vague phrasing ('Get a card'). Description is too minimal and doesn't specify what card information is included in the response. Enhanced version clarifies the complete scope of returned data and parameter requirements for AI agent clarity.

data.current_description: Returns the definition for a card with the given ID.
data.description_suggestion: Returns the complete definition for a card with the specified ID, including its display configuration, data fetch settings, custom actions, and object type associations. Requires both the app ID and card ID as path parameters.
data.reasoning: Summary uses vague phrasing ('Get a card'). Description is too minimal and doesn't specify what card information is included in the response. Enhanced version clarifies the complete scope of returned data and parameter requirements for AI agent clarity.

message: Operation 'patch-/crm/v3/extensions/cards-dev/{appId}/{cardId}_update' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Summary is acceptable, but description is too vague and lacks critical details. Enhanced version specifies the input schema (CardPatchRequest), clarifies partial update behavior (only provided fields change), and explains what is returned. This helps AI agents understand when to use PATCH vs other operations and what to expect.

data.current_description: Update a card definition with new details.
data.description_suggestion: Updates an existing card definition with new configuration details. Accepts a CardPatchRequest containing optional fields for display configuration, data fetch settings, and custom actions. Only provided fields are updated; omitted fields remain unchanged. Returns the updated card definition. Requires both app ID and card ID as path parameters.
data.reasoning: Summary is acceptable, but description is too vague and lacks critical details. Enhanced version specifies the input schema (CardPatchRequest), clarifies partial update behavior (only provided fields change), and explains what is returned. This helps AI agents understand when to use PATCH vs other operations and what to expect.

Operation 'get-/crm/v3/extensions/cards-dev/{appId}_getAll' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context. Description is too minimal. It lacks context about what card definitions contain, what the returned objects include, and the use case. Enhanced description provides clarity on card configuration details and helps AI agents understand the scope of returned data.

data.current_description: Returns a list of cards for a given app.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves all card definitions configured for the specified app. Returns a list of card objects with their current configuration, including display settings, data fetch configuration, and custom actions. Useful for auditing or managing all cards associated with an app.
data.reasoning: Description is too minimal. It lacks context about what card definitions contain, what the returned objects include, and the use case. Enhanced description provides clarity on card configuration details and helps AI agents understand the scope of returned data.

message: Operation 'post-/crm/v3/extensions/cards-dev/{appId}_create' has semantic quality issues: missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Original description lacks details about request body expectations and return value. Enhanced description clarifies input requirements (CardCreateRequest), output (card object with ID), and side effects (card activation and data fetch triggering). Improves AI agent understanding of when and how to use this operation.

data.current_description: Defines a new card that will become active on an account when this app is installed.
data.description_suggestion: Creates a new card definition for the specified app. Accepts a CardCreateRequest with card configuration including display settings, data fetch endpoint, and custom actions. Returns the created card object with a unique card ID. The card becomes active on accounts where the app is installed and will trigger data fetch requests when users visit relevant CRM record pages.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks details about request body expectations and return value. Enhanced description clarifies input requirements (CardCreateRequest), output (card object with ID), and side effects (card activation and data fetch triggering). Improves AI agent understanding of when and how to use this operation.

message: Operation 'delete-/crm/v3/extensions/cards-dev/{appId}/{cardId}_archive' has semantic quality issues: inconsistent_terminology, missing_output_details. Terminology inconsistency: operation ID uses 'archive' but summary/description use 'delete'. Enhanced summary aligns with operation ID. Description improved by clarifying return value (204 No Content) and broader impact (removal from all record pages). Better supports AI agent decision-making about operation consequences.

data.current_description: Permanently deletes a card definition with the given ID. Once deleted, data fetch requests for this card will no longer be sent to your service. This can't be undone.
data.description_suggestion: Permanently deletes a card definition with the given ID. Once deleted, data fetch requests for this card will no longer be sent to your service. This action cannot be undone. Returns a 204 No Content response on successful deletion. All instances of this card will be removed from CRM record pages.
data.reasoning: Terminology inconsistency: operation ID uses 'archive' but summary/description use 'delete'. Enhanced summary aligns with operation ID. Description improved by clarifying return value (204 No Content) and broader impact (removal from all record pages). Better supports AI agent decision-making about operation consequences.

message: Operation 'patch-/crm/v3/extensions/cards-dev/{appId}/{cardId}_update' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Description is too vague and lacks critical details. Enhanced description clarifies that it accepts CardPatchRequest, supports partial updates, returns the updated card object, and explains the immediate effect of changes. Helps AI agents understand input expectations, update behavior, and consequences.

data.current_description: Update a card definition with new details.
data.description_suggestion: Updates an existing card definition with new configuration details. Accepts a CardPatchRequest with optional fields for display settings, data fetch configuration, and custom actions. Supports partial updates - only provided fields will be modified. Returns the updated card definition object. Changes take effect immediately for all active instances of this card.
data.reasoning: Description is too vague and lacks critical details. Enhanced description clarifies that it accepts CardPatchRequest, supports partial updates, returns the updated card object, and explains the immediate effect of changes. Helps AI agents understand input expectations, update behavior, and consequences.
